name: Planning and sustainability
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: With many local authorities demanding that developers go over and above the building regulations with sustainability measures to secure planning permission this session explores new developments and brings you examples of successful schemes.

presentations.name: What is the cohesive, long term vision?
presentations.speakers: Professor Mark Gaterell, Professor of Sustainable Construction, Low Impact Buildings Centre, Coventry University

presentations.name: The NPPF and sustainable construction – negotiating the way forward
presentations.speakers: Chris Cousins, Local Government Liaison Manager, BRE

presentations.name: Delivering sustainability as a commercial reality
